name: Crable
description:
CRABLE

Genre : Platform/exploration isometric 3D game

Theme : Waves ( GGJ 2017)

Number of players : 1

Age : 8+

Average Gameplay time : 5-15 minutes

PROSPECT

STORY

A crab needs to join his mate at the other edge of the beach. He'll walk sideways there avoiding the waves, getting around rocks and various obstacles and eventual ennemies (bird, raccoon, seal).

GENERAL GAME IDEA

Being only able to move sideways and spin left or right, moving along the beach will be a challenge in itself. Timing is important regarding the waves. Some "enemies" are also to be avoided with varied difficulties and challenges.

GAMEPLAY

A : Back

D : Forward

W : Turn

GRAPHIC IDENTITY

3D environment.

3D characters and graphisms

Simple and cute

GAME COMPONENTS

long beach from left to right

Waves coming form the top

raccoons or bird coming from the bottom

safe points (holes)
